summary: This bill, S. 812, directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to ensure veterans can easily obtain physical copies of the form (Department of Veterans Affairs Form 10–3452 or its successor) required for reimbursement of travel expenses under section 111 of title 38, United States Code. Veterans can request the form by mail or pick it up at VA medical facilities. The bill also mandates that VA facilities evaluate and process the submitted forms and associated claims.
